name: Avoid PLI Procedures & Functions with more than 100 lines of code (PL1)
description: This rule searches for PLI Functions and PLI Procedures with more than 100 Lines of Code.
output:
The report lists all the PLI Functions and PLI Procedures having more than 100 lines of code.

It provides following information: 
-  procedure or function full name
rationale: Artifacts with more than 100 lines of code are generally difficult to maintain.
remediation: Split your procedures and functions in order to not have more than 100 lines of code.
total: Number of PLI Functions and PLI Procedures.
alternativeName: Avoid PLI Procedures & Functions with more than 100 lines of code (PL1)
